User session activity originating from u.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log and http.log for connections to web applications/services. Identify session source IP addresses. Geolocate source IPs and calculate frequency distribution of source countries/regions. Flag sessions from rare locations or unexpected system types (e.g., unusual User-Agent strings) based on low frequency or percentile analysis.

Access to sensitive web applications or.Action: Review Zeek http.log for access patterns to sensitive URLs/services. Identify repeated access by a user/source IP from disparate locations within a short timeframe using correlation analysis. Establish baseline access times for sensitive resources per user via descriptive statistics and flag access outside normal ranges (e.g., using IQR).
